title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the cognitive augmentation headset, including desired features, performance specifications, target user groups, and any relevant regulations or standards.

title: Design Hardware Components (Revised)
description: Design the physical hardware components of the headset, including neurostimulation circuitry, sensors, user interface, and power management system. Prioritize safety, ergonomics, regulatory compliance, and modularity for future upgrades. Consider incorporating feedback from the latest research on cognitive enhancement technologies.

title: Develop Firmware and Software
description: Develop the firmware and software necessary to control the neurostimulation and cognitive enhancement features of the headset.

title: Design User Interface and Experience (UI/UX)
description: Design the user interface and overall user experience for the headset, including mobile app or desktop software for configuration, monitoring, and data visualization. Consider accessibility and cross-platform compatibility.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures - RFC for Review
description: Develop and implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure the safe operation of the neurostimulation technology. This includes but is not limited to, secure data storage, encryption, anonymization techniques, and clear user consent procedures.

title: Conduct Testing and Validation
description: Develop and execute comprehensive testing plans to validate the functionality, performance, and safety of the cognitive augmentation headset.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create detailed documentation and user guides for the cognitive augmentation headset, covering installation, configuration, and usage instructions.

title: Implement DevOps and Deployment Processes
description: Set up robust DevOps processes and infrastructure for the efficient building, testing, deployment, and maintenance of the firmware, software, and any associated cloud services or backend components. The focus should be on ensuring continuous integration, delivery, and deployment (CI/CD), using best practices such as containerization, version control, automation, monitoring tools, and microservices architecture for scalability. Additionally, consider implementing a secure pipeline with regular code analysis, automated security testing, and vulnerability management.
